root.title: 43 Jalbak-Tash XVII
root.place: The inscription is among the inscriptions marked Jalbak-Tash from XVII to XXIX on so called Jalbak-Tash, Plane III. There are 13 inscriptions totally on the rock plane. The plane is in 2.5 high above the foot of the mountain. There was a stone shelf before bellow the plane. The stone shelf had been blown up later, when the motor-way was widened. The surface of the Plane III is formed like trapezium, with 155 cm in height, the bottom base is 115 cm, and the top is 68 cm.
root.general: Тігінен жазылған 9 таңбадан тұратын 1 жол. Таңбалар анық төменнен жоғаны жазылған. Бастапқы таңбалар биіктігі 3,2-3,5, кейінгі 4 таңба 5,1-3,7 см болып тұр.
root.description: The vertical line consists of 9 characters. The signs are very clear. Direction is from bottom to top. The initial characters are 3.2-3.5 in height, the last 4 characters are 5.1-3.7 cm.
root.size: Length of line 117.1 cm, Height of signs from 3.2 to 5.1 cm.
root.investigation: Kubarev found in 1987 582. The text is studied by Kyzlasov 578, but it was not read yet. Publications: Kyzlasov 517, Kubarev 581, Kocheev 523.

pdf.f_title: Свод древнетюркских рунических памятников Горного Алтая. Горно-Алтайск: АКИН, 2006. – 52 с.
Новости тюркской рунологии. Выпуск 1. Енисейские надписи на горе Ялбак-таш (Горный Алтай). - М.: 2003, - 112 с.
